alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 01 at 2:18AM MDT until April 01 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected in the mountains. Up to 60 mph possible in the Lander Foothills. Gusts of 70 to 80 mph possible along Wyoming Highway 28 at Red Canyon. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 11 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest potential for high wind in Lander is late Saturday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Use caution if driving. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East
